channel.title: Forum games [READ]
channel.description:
We've decided to try out the idea of forum games, I'll give a brief idea of what's allowed here (with some other info):
[ol][li]No "Let's count to 10000" or similar games, they have to be GAMES, not just pure spam.[/li] [li]The other global forum rules apply, if you break those, you will be punished.[/li] [li]Use your common sense, don't make the games massively stupid - The staff reserve the right to remove games as they see fit.[/li] [li]Post count is disabled here[/li][/ol]
If you have any question please post in this topic, as always, with any suggestions either post a topic or PM an administrator. Have fun!

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

We’ve decided to try out the idea of forum games, I’ll give a brief idea of what’s allowed here (with some other info):

[ol][li]No “Let’s count to 10000” or similar games, they have to be GAMES, not just pure spam.[/li]
[li]The other global forum rules apply, if you break those, you will be punished.[/li]
[li]Use your common sense, don’t make the games massively stupid - The staff reserve the right to remove games as they see fit.[/li]
[li]Post count is disabled here[/li][/ol]

If you have any question please post in this topic, as always, with any suggestions either post a topic or PM an administrator. Have fun!
